Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD !! 5 Active buyers still looking !
This single-level quality home is ideal for first-time buyers or perfect investment opportunity with its free-flowing design, a long list of features & low-maintenance surrounds. You will be impressed by your first step into this three-bedroom home which has been masterfully appointed with classy and stylish fixtures and fittings throughout.
The home's inviting interior comprises 3 spacious bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe), Every room filled with natural light, stylish ensuite & main central bathroom - both with floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a versatile open-plan huge living area adjoining dining area accompanied by a sleek stone-bench kitchen with tiled, stainless steel appliances, heating, split system, outdoor entertaining area, landscaped backyard gardens to both the front and rear yards and double lock-up garage.--
* High square-set ceilings throughout
* Spacious Laundry and lots of storage
* Public Transport Short Drive away
* Easy access onto the Freeway & Local Schools
* Minutes away from the Upcoming Business Center & all the amenities--
This is a rare gem that ticks all the boxes of modern, low maintenance living with room for the entire family. Inspect today and you will not be disappointed.

WOW FACTOR !!!
Located in an ever growing Annadale estate with local parks, shops and school all locked in and not to far from being just minutes away.
Featuring 4 good sized bedrooms (master with full en-suite and WIR). Leading through to an open plan living including good size kitchen with stone bench tops & walk in pantry that overlooks family living and dining area leads to undercover alfresco with build in gas cook-top, spacious courtyard. Central bathroom, great size laundry, double remote garage with internal access!

Description:
Home Sweet Home
Free-flowing, functional and low maintenance, this thoughtfully designed 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home uses space efficiently and effectively. All the hard work has been done for you - just move straight in and relax!
Everything about this quality-built home feels right, from the high-end fittings to every dazzling detail and flawless finish.
Discover a sleek, stone-topped kitchen with a dishwasher,
900m appliances and ample cupboard space. Fabulously far-reaching, open-plan living and dining gives way to a low maintenance rear yard which will have you entertaining family and friends all year round!
All the bedrooms are generously sized with the luxurious master suite boasting walk-in robes, and a sleek ensuite.
Comprehensive features include central heating and cooling throughout, a separate split system and a single garage which may also be used for a business (has internal and external access).
A lifestyle location does not get any better than this, moments from transport, shopping, schools and parklands- Perfectly positioned in the Highlands Estate.
This is the life!

Description:
HANDCRAFTED CANADIAN LOG CABIN, SET ON 2.6 ACRES!
SUCCESSFULLY TAKEN OVER AND SOLD - FOR IN EXCESS OF $2 MILLION - BY JASON PADULA!
Go to Jason Padula Real Estate on YouTube or Facebook, for all the campaign highlights!
With the main dwelling, covered outdoor deck & American Barn measuring a combined 100 squares (approx.) under roof line, this unique homestead on TOWN WATER is characterised not only by its size, but by an established & sustainable allotment...that's anything but a blank canvas!
The home was built with complete attention to detail by the current Vendors, some 13 years ago. Their inspiration? Log homes typically found in Canada are ageless, solid, warm, comfortable & will be a source of pride + satisfaction for generations to come. Machine cut Cypress Pines were purchased direct from the mill in Toowoomba (Qld), the only place in Australia to produce them. Large stones were also sourced & along with rendered brickwork, form the major construction components of this characteristic abode.
Once you walk inside, the "anything but standard" inclusions continue to impress & with dramatic effect, namely:
namely:
- Stone "Fossilized tree roots" splash backs
- Red Gum ledges on servery, fire place & wet bar
- Cedar-framed double hung windows & doors
- Balinese Hut with 8-seater electric heated spa, set in a private sanctuary
The layout of the home flows beautifully from one zone to the next incorporating theatre room, two pac kitchen with Cesar stone tops + walk-in pantry, huge meals/family area, Master suite with Parisian-style walk-in robe/dressing room, funky bathrooms, zoned kid's bedrooms, a stunning upper level mezzanine with three rooms off the main expanse & sprawling undercover entertaining area to cater for the largest of gatherings!
Out back, a steel-framed American Barn measures 12m x 18mbigger than a standard suburban home. It comes fully equipped with a kitchen, bathroom, TV & more. The rest of the allotment features 2 water tanks (40,700 litres), a row of 5 x orchards (4 separately meshed), electric front security gate with intercom & exotic (fruiting & otherwise) trees throughout.
With a re-build value of approximately $3.25 million, this is an easy top choice should you be considering a premium lifestyle property in quiet, serene Micklehamjust a short drive to bustling Craigieburn & 35km's to the Melbourne CBD.
Terms: 7-10% deposit, Settlement: 130-160 days
Contact: Jason Padula 0402 149 436
Like/subscribe to Jason Padula Real Estate on Facebook or YouTube

Your Dream Home is Waiting !!
Located in the popular Annadale Estate and in one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs, this magnificent allotment measuring a total land area of 510sqm approx. will be the ideal community for your brand new home.
Only 38km from the CBD, Annadale is an estate of 1200 homes, conveniently located near the future Mickleham Town Centre. Current plans for Annadale include a primary school, sports facility, two parks, playgrounds and integrated walking trails through the woodlands.
A truly wonderful opportunity to establish yourself in the developing Melbourne location of Mickleham

Description:
BEVERIDGE LAND FOR SALE
Resort Style Living - Build Your Brand New Dream in Mandalay Estate
Does your 2020 bucket list involve a brand new home, complete with all the personal touches youve longed for? Or are you a builder or investor who is looking to take advantage of a blank canvas in a prime position? This is the enticing opportunity which could be yours to enjoy!
Measuring 515m2 and located amongst high quality homes in the sought-after Mandalay Estate, youll also benefit from access to Club Mandalay, which not only offers a wealth of leisure facilities but also a picturesque place to gather with friends, family and neighbours. Golf enthusiasts, youre catered for too take advantage of playing the greens of a course which is currently ranked 38th in Australia, designed by five-time British Open Champion and renowned golf course architect, Peter Thomson.
Situated just a short drive from the freeway and less than an hour from the CBD, its also central to Wallans shopping and eating precinct, public and private schools and public transport.
Escape to tranquillity and create the dream home you deserve contact Daniel Bruggink for more information today.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy on 627m2
Sure to make an impression that lasts, this luxurious family home is well situated the highly coveted "Bridgehaven" estate of Highlands sitting on a massive 627m2 (approx..) of prime land.
Greeted by a spacious entry, on offer are good sized bedrooms, HUGE master with double vanity ensuite and walk in robe, a well-appointed kitchen with stone bench top, 900mm SS appliances, dishwasher and walk-in pantry, adjoining to the open plan meals and family area, separate formal lounge/over-sized study and spacious alfresco with large shed and beautiful landscaped gardens.
A Long list of other extras include a double remote control garage with internal access, separate central bathroom, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, gas log fire-place, split system cooling/heating, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters, chic light fittings & quality floor coverings, HEAPS of additional storage and cabinetry.
Directly adjacent beautiful parkland & within close proximity to local amenities as well as Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. Inspect fast as this one won't last!

Description:
This is the ONE!
This amazing 3 bedroom house is sitting on a massive 665 sqm land approx! Enjoy the benefits of living in a central location close to schools, shops and public transport.
Step inside and you will appreciate the wide open spaces and generous living accommodation. Comprising of 3 bedrooms, master with WIR & ensuite- Remaining bedrooms all with built in robes, serviced by a central bathroom.
Slide open the back door and enjoy the very best of outdoor living. The alfresco entertaining area can be fully enclosed with quality cafe style blinds over-looking to your generous size rear yard surrounded by fruit trees. Other features include heating, cooling, double garage with drive through access to the rear yard.
With so much on offer, words simply do not do this home justice. You must inspect to fully appreciate all it has to offer. Whether youre a first home buyer or a smart investor, this amazing property is the right one for you!
Inspection by appointment only, Please contact Eddi Bagdadi on 0432 208 933 to arrange your inspection.

**SOLD BEFORE AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437***
NO BODY CORPORATE - Designed to make the most of its privileged Highlands Estate location overlooking Thorngrove Reserve, this sophisticated town home is refined in concept, rich in character and quality. Impressive spaces for contemporary living and dining, including a stylish Caesar-stone and stainless steel fitted kitchen, lead to a low-maintenance outdoor backdrop of pleasing depth. Alluring 2 bedroom accommodation on the upstairs level features a main bedroom accompanied by an elegant central/semi-ensuite bathroom and beautiful balcony views over the park. Freshly painted, further enhanced by timber floors, heating/cooling and convenient secure carport, this is a residence that delivers desirable proximity to Aitken Creek Primary School and the Mount Ridley College campus while Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre is always easily reached. An excellent opportunity to attain a great lifestyle or to acquire a reliably rewarding investment property, this address is ideal either way!

Perfect Property for First Home Buyer or Investor in Premium Location
Expression of Interest closing by 4th of July by 5.00pm
This quality build family home is only 5-year-old and still comes with balance of builders warranty, built designed to live, entertain and enjoy a unique lifestyle with family and friends for years to come, combining modern free flowing floorplan and unparalleled quality, showcasing commanding street presence.
Sitting amongst the finest neighbourhood in a very sought after location close to walking distance to Craigieburn central, local schools, well maintained park lands, health & leisure centres and public transport, this is the perfect home where you want to grow your family.
The notable features are
Large double story home on approx. 360m2 land
3 bedrooms make it ideal for first home buyer, investor or downsizer.
Spacious kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances
Luxury master suite with access to its own balcony with uninterrupted views of the parkland just opposite the house.
Alfresco to entertain friends and family for years to come.
Evaporative cooling & ducted heating
Security alarm and cctv camera system for added security
High ceilings
Remote operated double garage.
Spacious low maintenance backyard. Let your kids & pets run freely in the safety of your backyard.
Inspection is must. Call today.

Description:
Passage To Undisturbed Tranquility- An Acreage Paradise
**SOLD AT A RECORD PRICE BY SAHIL KAKAR-Connect via facebook, Instagram, YouTube & Linkedin**
ALL INSPECTIONS BY APPT ONLY- PLEASE CONTACT THE AGENT TO ORGANISE A TIME SLOT FOR SAT
Perfectly positioned, exquisitely maintained, premium built, idealistic space & phenomenal location are just the starting point of this luxurious house sitting on 3 acres of illustrious land. From the moment you walk in- the boastful facade triggers your sense of love, life & laughter. The vintage classic exterior is complimented with an ultra modern interior which symbolises the true meaning of best of both worlds.
Living is easy in this opulent property encompassing an open floor plan with four spacious bedrooms, plenty of room for study, sleep and storage, two modern bathrooms, and an elegant and stylish kitchen with a 4m long Cesar stone(40MM) island bench with storage cabinets on both sides.
The generously-sized living area is graced by an inbuilt dual fireplace, huge windows, french colonial doors, high ceilings and glass sliding doors that lead to the awe-inspiring pergola. If security was your concern, fear no more as this property is surrounded by 8 CCTV cameras, 2 intercom stations and home lifestyle technology- NESS home security.
Enjoy outdoor gatherings in the large undercover entertainment area with 3 independently remote controlled sun blinds, two ceiling fans, Merbau feature fencing. Gardening is made easy as the property features retaining walls in garden beds as well as irrigation watering lines.
Some distinguished features include:
** Sydney Bluegum Timber Flooring in Living Areas
** Triple Door American Barn with dimensions of 11M*18M
** Study/Home Office Professionally Fitted Out
** 900MM- European Stainless Steel Appliances
** Master En-suite(HIS & HERS WIR's) and Shared Bath both fitted with SPA
** Large Undercover Entertaining Area
** Double Automatic Garage with an attached Store Room Providing Internal & Rear Access
** Large 3 Door Fitted Storage Cupboards in Laundry with the external access
** Cesar stone bench top throughout the home
** Fully Landscaped Low Maintenance Gardens- Fresh water tanks 11,000L & 22,000L & Town Water Supply
** Ducted Super Effective & Efficient Refrigerated Air Conditioning(Industrial Grade 1) & Heating
** Tranquility at its best with the rear fence bordering-Malcolm Creek Nature Reserve
** 5.1 Surround Sound Ready Lounge Theatre Retreat and so much more
This gorgeous property is not only the passage to undisturbed tranquility it is also located in a prime location. It is in close proximity to many schools, shopping areas, park lands and only a shocking 35 minutes to the CBD.
105 Arcadia Avenue, Mickleham- is the dream home for those who wants to be surrounded by nature, indulging in the serenity that 200+ mature screening plants bring to one. Such rear opportunities arise only for those who are true opportunist looking to settle for nothing less than superior luxury and perfection to say the least.
Don't let this pass and contact you local agent Sahil Kakar on 0401 926 466 or Sachin Khera on 0433 110 100 to book in a private inspection today.

To eliminate any issues we are following govt protocol to practice hygienic and safe environment for health and well being.
Any recent overseas travellers are requested to stay in isolation and same is expected with anyone having any flu related symptoms. Please give us a call and we can assist you with the virtual options. Thank you- The Eleet Wyndham City

Description:
PRESENTATION, POSITION, PERFECT!
Spacious design, striking décor and landscaped surrounds illustrate the allure of this impeccable 4 bedroom home providing a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle in a quiet yet wonderfully convenient pocket of Craigieburn.
Light and bright interior features new carpet throughout, roomy master suite with walk-in robe and sparkling ensuite with double vanity, 3 further well-appointed bedrooms each with built-in robes, main family bathroom with tub and separate toilet. Add to this well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher, gas cook top, walk in pantry, spacious and versatile open-plan living/dining area leading out to an alfresco style undercover entertaining zone, making it the centerpiece of this home.
Further features of the home include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, internally accessed double-garage, ceiling fans and much more. Only minutes drive from childcare facilities, reserves, local shops, Kolbe College, selection of Primary Schools and also offers easy access to Craigieburn's major shopping centers & Aitkin Boulevard.

Description:
Quality With The Location To Match.
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Comprising of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals area/family area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, floating floor boards, quality window furnishings, alarm system, ducted vacuum, remote control double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Ideally located in one of Mickleham's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland, All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
The perfect place to raise your family.
Superbly located inside the exclusive Mandalay Estate backing onto the Golf course, this luxurious contemporary double storey home offers a beautifully zoned floorplan to perfectly accommodate your family.
Upon entering you encounter the spacious central living hub comprising of dining and open plan family areas adjacent to the kitchen as well as a theatre room, separate study/5th bedroom, powder room and laundry. The well-equipped modern kitchen comes complete with stainless steel appliances including 900mm freestanding oven, gas cook top and range hood, built in microwave, dishwasher, stone bench tops, window splash back, walk in pantry and huge island bench perfect for casual meals.
Upstairs offers another living space and four bedrooms; the master suite with feature pendant lighting, ceiling fan, fitted large walk in robe and full sized ensuite with bath. The other bedrooms are served by a large central bathroom and a separate toilet.
Step outside to large alfresco area overlooking the Golf Course what better outlook could you need. Other features include remote control three car garage with rear roller door, ducted heating and split system air conditioning, down lights, front and rear landscaped gardens. Residents have access to the Mandalay Club House facilities including gymnasium, swimming pool, tennis courts & café. Mandalay also offers Child care, Primary School and Greater Beveridge Community Centre; the perfect place to raise your family.
